name: test_weight_or_ratio_zero_denominator_allowed
description: Documents that WeightOrRatio::Ratio allows zero denominator at the type level. This is a dangerous edge case that could cause division-by-zero in consuming contracts. Validation must happen in the DAO contract, not the interface.
descriptionHtml: Documents that WeightOrRatio::Ratio allows zero denominator at the type level. This is a dangerous edge case that could cause division-by-zero in consuming contracts. Validation must happen in the DAO contract, not the interface.
